title: Tiki armor
summaries: Tiki armor is a Hardmode post-Plantera armor set purchased from the Witch Doctor for 1 PC50 GC (set). On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, the Pygmy Staff must be in the player's inventory in order for the Witch Doctor to sell the armor.
A full set of Tiki armor provides the following benefits:

• +35 defense
  • +4 minion slots
  • +30% summon damage
  • (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) +30% whip range
With all pieces equipped, an additional 4 <linked>minions</linked> can be summoned (for a total of 5).

statistics.Set Bonus:
Increases your max number of minions
Increases whip range by 20%
statistics.Buy: 1 PC50 GC (set)
statistics.Sell: 30 GC (set)
